Directions: Prepare macaroni and cheese according to package directions. Stir in the soup, milk, salmon, onion and cheddar cheese. Transfer to a greased 1-1/2-qt. baking dish. Sprinkle with bread crumbs; dot with butter. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees F for 30 minutes or until heated through.
Ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package deluxe macaroni and cheese dinner mix
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
1 (6 ounce) can skinless boneless salmon, drained
